website_summaries.verdict: This moderately priced nail gun was built to last, and it will easily lay down hundreds of nails before it needs recharging.
pros: Drives up to 420 nails per charge
cons: This nail gun kit does not include a storage case

customer_reviews.title: Great for installing mouldings!
customer_reviews.text: Installed 150 feet of baseboard moulding in 5 hrs with no jams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does 16 and 18 even though it shouldn't
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the link saying "frequently bought together" was 18 guage nails. I didn't pay attention that this is a 16 nail gun. Since I could return it I tried their 18 guage nails. It worked. I shot about 30 18 guage nails with no problem. My carpenter has a battery gun that is very noisy like a gun shot and when it reloads it makes even more noise. This one doesn't do that. Just a single pop and the nail goes in where the depth is set. It's like a semi auto pistol with a silencer. Pop pop pop job is done.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Great tool. Quick easy accurate. So happy I got this to finish 1/4 round after tiling. Was going to pay someone to do it after hard work of tiling but this is almost fun. So worth it. The cost was very reasonable and I already used it to do another project for my wife. Not having to buy and find space to store a compressor was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Awesome time saver
customer_reviews.text: This nailer did exactly what I intended it to do. I had a large trim project on a remodel and was dreading it. But with the addition of this nailer, no cords to chase, plenty of power, easy to load. The only minor downside was that with the extended battery which is larger it gives your wrist a work out after extended use horizontally on base boards and shoe moulding. But it was very tolerable and cut the install time in half. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this for DIY use
customer_reviews.text: After remodeling the living room and nailing all the trim up by hand I broke down and ordered this for the kitchen trim and beyond. Bad eyes and arthritis make the job less fun than it once was. Yes I know it's not a top of the line nailer but the price and value of this really are superb. I haven't had a single issue so far and have shot lots 2" brads with it so far. if I were a professional trim carpenter I'd look at the Milwaukee but for a DIY guy with a couple more rooms to remodel, I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good nailgun
customer_reviews.text: It's a great gun that comes with everything. Be aware you won't be able to nail many in a short time-frame. The device needs time to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Too many limitations for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Would be a good product if you are always in a warm environment and far away from a compressor but the battery won't charge or is slow to charge in low temps and seems weak when it's done. The portability just wasn't worth the extra price especially with the added limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Brad Nailer!
customer_reviews.text: Albeit this was my first nailer I’d ever purchased, it was perfect for the job I bought it for. I installed shiplap in my home office and this nailer made quick work of it. The battery lasted the entire project and never jammed or malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle James

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product works pretty well w certain brads had a lot of jams but when I tried another brand the nailer worked great.... good penetrations and no damage to the wood like in air nailers
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Used to replace baseboards in entire house. Love the portability and east of use. A little heavy but not bad for me. Experience brad jams when I load a full tray so I break them in half and that’s perfect for me. Very pleased with this nailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working the second time using it! Even took it to Lowe’s and they could not figure out what was wrong. So disappointed because it did so great the first time I used it and then stopped Working mid project
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to finish installing baseboards and moulding after Covid 19 started and my contractor did not return. This Brad/Nailer is fantastic. It is easy to use. Instructions are simple. So nice to be so easily putting up moulding also without the destructive hammer impact on your project. I love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to literally rip your own hair out stand by strand, do not buy this brad nailer. Maybe if you enjoy stopping after EVERY. SINGLE. NAIL. to clear a jam in the gun, I don't think this will work for you. It might be the right nailer for you, however, if there are zero time restrictions on your projects, or you have an endless budget for broken or jammed nails. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nailgun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and long lasting battery. I remodeled my whole laundry room, including installing wainscoting and all new trim. This baby saved me tons of time and the charge held for the whole day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Old battery
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but the battery was over 2 years old, if i ever have an issue with the battery i am out of luck on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it, made the job of redoing the bedroom alot eaiser
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Fishing lights and won't work
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine now when I use it it will start flashing and won't work. I thought there was a jam but nothing. I have to remove the battery and it will work again but after a few rounds it will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: otto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put up the Chair rail at my school, It cut my time to one-tenth of the time, it set every nail to the perfect depth. Being powered by battery was the sealing deal, making it portable to move down the rail with ease! I would recommend this to anyone who is a Do-it-yourself person!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery H

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine, Wish I could find one that handled larger nails for around the same price. Ran about 3000 nails through it with no jams and only one bent nail. Not bad for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Brewmaster

customer_reviews.title: Used it once,,it worked like a champ, didnt work 2nd time, but Amazon made it right!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this tool for a fence project in June 2020,,, stored it in a dry closet and when I needed it for its 2nd job, it doesn't fire the nail. Customer Service was awesome helping me get an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Truly a great tool. We didnt want a brad nailer that was hooked up to a cord. This is super simple to use and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert dosh

customer_reviews.title: I’m like to return the unit and get refund
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit, after 10 nails the United fail, it stopped fire I checked the battery and recharged but still does not fire, I would to return it but I don’t know where to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Sagala

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Buy
customer_reviews.text: Light duty for general woodworking (not construction or building a lawn shed:-)) Built 18 center pieces for my granddaughter's wedding without a hitch, right out of the box. Just had to adjust the penetration for the wood I was using. No case included, just the box. Looking forward to the next project.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hentschel

customer_reviews.title: Saved me hours of time!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to speed up the process of trimming an entire room and boy did it help. What was originally a 10 minute process was reduced to less than a minute. If you have a lot of nailing to do I would recommend ordering some more nails. Love this product and it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: An electric that actually works
customer_reviews.text: Drove the included long brads into 5/8 inch hardwood no problem on deepest setting. Also used on 3/4 inch pine and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: entropy

customer_reviews.title: such a help
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done, exiited to do some more home improvement with it, trim and molding. It is great to not have a cord and compressor
customer_reviews.author: Buckeyeluvngurl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a bit heavy for this grandma. But eventually I was able to use with one hand. I hung 6 8x4ft sheets of paneling by myself with this tool. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: I do several projects a day, no more air compressor or hoses, this gun does the job. I have some extra batteries as back up for my everyday use. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: User friendly, efficient Brad Nailer.
customer_reviews.text: This Brad Nailer is everything you’d expect from a trusted brand name, Craftsman. It’s easy to use, jams are seldom and easily remedied, and has more than sufficient power (eg Trim). It’s a little heavy but to be expected as is with most cordless power tools. Overall, it certainly beats dragging around a cord with compressor.
customer_reviews.author: KB4

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good price...and good value! I’m pleased...we replaced the molding after doing laminate floor. Super good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dniles

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to finish off some bookshelves I built. Used it to attach the crown molding, the trim and the baseboard. It was pretty easy to figure out how to use and it made my work so much easier. This is the first time I have owned one of these and I wish I would have purchased one sooner. Easy to load the brads and easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon W Cisney

customer_reviews.title: Seller is amazing! Take pics of any damage!
customer_reviews.text: It failed to work properly for us, but as far as the brand itself we went and bought a 16 gauge and it works amazing. This one was just damaged during delivery. Also highly recommend the seller. The most amazing response time with issues and keeps you up to date on any ongoing issues until it’s completely resolved!!!
customer_reviews.author: lizbeth Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Soo far a great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far this gun works great Have not had any real issues with it Looking to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really buy this brand, but it works great. We’ll just see how long it lasts. I’ll update later.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle fuentes

customer_reviews.title: A best buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put down baseboard and quarter round. It worked great for my purpose. Can't address its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: COM 47

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used it to nail down the quarter round molding and it was quick and easy. I didn’t have to worry about cords or anything! It still has a charge today even though I do not need it right now. 🙌🏾
customer_reviews.author: DistinctTax

customer_reviews.title: Right tool for the job makes it fun
customer_reviews.text: So I've hated doing trim my whole life till I got this thing. Having the right tool for the job makes it fun to do. I feel like this is a great investmen.
customer_reviews.author: NOIRPA

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very much worth its price. So glad that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: londi Locqs

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to use and charges quick
customer_reviews.text: Works so good. So nice not to use the air compressor. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gcam

customer_reviews.title: It was cheaper than Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I went with the Craftsman cordless. It’s easy to use and not that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fixed the fence in my backyard in 5 mins. Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: AgentKinsu

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: works good just remember that is has a short delay after triger pull
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Life

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Its a little heavy but has the kick of a pneumatic, but no hose or electric cords to scuff walls.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gantman

customer_reviews.title: Craftman nail gun
customer_reviews.text: Love the craftsman nail gun my husband uses it on the inside when he’s got something inside that Hass to be done
customer_reviews.author: Betty Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nailer brad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nailer brad, it push the nail precisely to the wood surface, without leaving any marks. Used before Air Impact that was totally waste of money. I’ll recommend to anyone that want a reliable tool for personal use and house improvement projects.
customer_reviews.author: ThoT.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding nail gun. It took me awhile to realize it has a small safety lock switch, but after that I could do anything with it. The battery lasts a decent amount of time and charges extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Steckey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Thing is easy to use and has plenty of power to sink nails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great Brad nailer. I would recommend it to anyone that is looking to pick up woodworking. The quality is great! I never had any issues with jamming so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent James

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, so far used for several moulding/trim projects around the house. Can go a long time between charges, and when it does need to be charged it charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lambro

customer_reviews.title: Try the KIMO or the Ryobi
customer_reviews.text: I was excited at first. I think I'm use to the rapid action and not the delay that this nailer has when firing nail. It's heavier than expected and want to go with another brand. All in all, I'm not satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: embee

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it now.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Fast battery charge. Adjustable nail depth. Low maintenance. Cordless is the best option to make all jobs easy!
customer_reviews.author: B. Vande.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but jams A LOT
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient tool, however it jams almost every other nail which can be quite frustrating. Luckily it is very fast and easy to clean jams/misfires.
customer_reviews.author: MsbEVOgsr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Other than trying to shoot 2 at once in the run strip of Brad's it has been flawless...
customer_reviews.author: Locangelo

customer_reviews.title: excellent trim tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool battery life is outstanding gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nail gun to change the trim work throughout my house. It worked great
customer_reviews.author: JimmyV

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality, quality, quality!! Great nailer with plenty of power. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeyHelps

customer_reviews.title: Good nailer
customer_reviews.text: Drives 2” brads all the way in. What else can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really good buy but you have to take your time with it. It takes probably 5 to 10 seconds between nails depending on how much battery life it has
customer_reviews.author: Derick

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not very good for baseboard or door casing because it won't sink 2" nails every time. However if you use a shorter nail it's much better. It is lightweight and easy to use too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. LOVE IT. I HAVEN'T STOP USING IT FROM THE TIME I PURCHASED. A MANS MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.author: Ray Newsome

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!️
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!️ Works amazing. They could put a case for it but other than that I love it. Looks, works, great and light weight also. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats a hamer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brad hammer . Great deal on amazon compared to your local stores
customer_reviews.author: leland paradis

customer_reviews.title: This is a must BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new toy and I wish I had it months ago for other projects!!! Its a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good nailer, a little too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This nailer is a little more bulky and heavy than others I have owned. I like the adjustable driver wheel. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to use. Battery has staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and delivery. Works great and lightweight. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy without hauling a compressor around. Great price and so far think it is a quality product. Is also very quiet compared to a compressor.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing nailer
customer_reviews.text: Its been great for us, over 2000 lf of quarter rounds and baseboards already installed using it
customer_reviews.author: Omar Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Price was great and makes the job SO much easier! Very reliable and recommended by a DeWalt owner!
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn Lee Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Jammed on occasion on the shorter nails but easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel D Oawster

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool....fun to use. I wish I had bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool I have put 1500 nails through the gun with no problems
customer_reviews.author: edward cihak

product_meta.title: CRAFTSMAN V20 Cordless Brad Nailer Kit, 18GA (CMCN618C1)
product_meta.description: Style:18GA Brad Nailer KitThis CRAFTSMAN V20 20V max* 18GA cordless finish nailer's cordless design eliminates the need for compressors, hoses, or costly Gas cartridges. The motor delivers consistent power firing in various weather conditions and materials. The extensive runtime on a single battery and Fast shot speed allow for less downtime on the jobsite. The single tool-free depth setting makes adjusting your nail depth quick and simple, while the other tool-free settings make potential nail jams or stalls easy to fix. The cordless finish nailer is lightweight and well balanced, making this product very comfortable to use for prolonged time.
feature_bullets: Part of the V20 cordless system
CRAFTSMAN V20 20V max* cordless nailer drives adhesive collated 18gauge Brad nails
Fully cordless design eliminates the need for compressors, hoses or costly Gas cartridges
Provides consistent firing power in various climate conditions and materials
Tool-free depth settings for quick set up and consistent results
Toolfree jam and stall settings for ease of use and improved efficiency
Lightweight with optimal center of gravity provide optimal balance and comfort in hand during use
Contoured overmolded handle for added comfort during use
Belt hook provides convenient access and storage
V20 20V MAX* Battery with high performance cells can fire up to 420 2in. nails in pine on a single charge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars374 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
